about_the_game:
Learn more about the art, music, story, and general behind-the-scenes info for One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party in this digital artbook!

The file is a 60 page PDF that show off all the assets for the game, with artist commentary.
If you're curious about Beracus, Lee, the world they live in, the underground bunker, the skeleton family, or generally about how games like this are made-- this PDF is for you!
detailed_description:
Learn more about the art, music, story, and general behind-the-scenes info for One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party in this digital artbook!
